channel.title: What we have done on Expert Analytics
channel.description: Recent content in What we have done on Expert Analytics

item.title: Shyft
item.description: Shyft is an open source high performance simulator for distributed hydrological simulations, with Expert Analytics AS as one of the major contributors.

item.title: The ADAM platform
item.description: Domain modelling of the hydro thermic electrical system in order to allow advanced context based analysis and visualization.

item.title: Machine Learning in Cancer Immunotherapy
item.description: A small bioinformatics software company is trying to disrupt in precision cancer immunotherapy. They marked themselves using machine learning to predict the effect of a therapy.

item.title: Advanced Scheduling and Prediction
item.description: Off-the-shelf analytics tools to improve resource allocation and predict customer behaviour.

item.title: Applied Machine Learning in Hydropower
item.description: One of Europe’s largest generators of renewable energy and leading company in hydropower set out to explore the potential of digitalization for its hydropower plants.

item.title: Mobile Payments
item.description: Since 2013, we have been involved in projects with Norwegian companies building mobile payment systems; mCash, Auka, and Vipps. Our involvement have mostly been on the backend, working on core transaction and settlement logic as well as internal and external APIs.
